name: SUPER LASER AEGIS
description:
SUPER LASER AEGIS is a small dungeon adventure with some roguelike elements (kinda) in which your only weapon is your laser shield. 

The game features 41 levels but you get to see only a random 20 of them in a single run, if you get to the end at least...

The order of the levels, the content of chests and the outcome of certain traps are all randomly chosen. The layout of the levels stays the same with a few exceptions. 

DISCLAIMER FROM THE CREATOR

The game was developed as a sort of personal game jam in a work time of:

19 Days 3 Hours 45 Minutes 12 Seconds

I quite enjoyed writing all the code, the music and drawing all the art for this one, so I really hope someone will enjoy at least some of the stuff in it. 

If not, well, f@#! me...
